job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Build scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment (Databricks) using python and Apache spark.
job_tasks.justification: This describes building scalable solutions in a cloud environment, which is a core software engineering task, fitting the Software Development & Integration category.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop projects through proof-of-concept, pilot and full deployment phases.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase outlines the lifecycle of software development, from initial concept to deployment, which falls under Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Further develop the AI components in our data platform to improve our technical infrastructure, standards of working and tool stack.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves improving existing technical infrastructure and tool stacks, which is a core software engineering responsibility related to development and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate the final model with other aspects of the application; design and control how they communicate with one another (REST APIs, database queries, etc..).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions integrating models with applications and managing their communication via APIs and database queries, which is a key aspect of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on communicating technical information to stakeholders and explaining complex concepts, which is a clear indicator of Communication & Collaboration skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment with new ideas, technologies and data to stay posted on the latest developments and identify new use cases to leverage them.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes experimentation with new technologies and data to identify use cases, which aligns with the research and experimentation aspect of Model Development & Fine-Tuning.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.
soft_skills.justification: This task directly involves communicating technical information to various audiences and using visualization, fitting the Communication & Collaboration category.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on software engineering tasks (building scalable solutions, development phases, improving infrastructure, integrating models via APIs) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions AI/model-based solutions and experimentation with new technologies, the core responsibilities are centered around the development and integration of these solutions into a broader application and data platform, rather than deep model development or specialization in GenAI techniques like prompt engineering or RAG. The role is about building and integrating AI, not solely focusing on the AI models themselves.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is quite clear about its core responsibilities, leaning heavily towards software engineering with AI integration. However, it doesn't explicitly mention Generative AI specific tasks or tools, making it slightly less definitive for a 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile. The classification as 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is strongly supported, but a perfect score would require more explicit mention of GenAI technologies or tasks.
